summary: A clairvoyant woman discovers a skeleton in a wall in her husband's house, and seeks to find the truth about what happened to the victim.
cast: Jennifer O'Neill|Gabriele Ferzetti|Marc Porel|Gianni Garko|Evelyn Stewart|Jenny Tamburi|Fabrizio Jovine|Riccardo Parisio Perrotti|Loredana Savelli|Salvatore Puntillo|Bruno Corazzari|Vito Passeri|Franco Angrisano|Veronica Michielini|Paolo Pacino|Fausta Avelli|Elizabeth Turner|Ugo D'Alessio|Luigi Diberti
title: Siete notas en negro
